Steps: 1. Open index.php 2. Navigate to about.php, campaigns.php, shop.php 3. Verify accessibility
Expected Result: Each page loads without auth, static content/images render, navigation links work

Preconditions: Catalog seeded with =3 categories and price tiers
Steps: 1. Open shop.php 2. Apply category filter, price filter, search term 3. Clear filters
Expected Result: Product list updates accordingly; URL/params preserved; clearing restores full list

Steps: 1. Visit campaigns.php 2. Inspect progress bars, days remaining, volunteer counts
Expected Result: Progress bars match DB values; cards show correct metadata; expired campaigns marked

Steps: 1. Open items.php and item-detail.php for each state
Expected Result: Available/reserved items visible with badges; hidden not shown; sold flagged

Steps: 1. Add item qty2 2. Update qty4 3. Remove item
Expected Result: Cart table updates, qty capped at stock, header badge via get-cart-count API

Steps: 1. Use Clear Cart button 2. Confirm prompt
Expected Result: All rows deleted, totals zeroed, page shows empty state
Valid order shows statuses; invalid code returns error
Feedback stored with user ID, success notice shown
